title: Pasta Carbonara
preparation_steps: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Fry bacon. 3. Beat eggs and mix with cheese. 4. Combine pasta, bacon, and egg mixture. 5. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Curry
preparation_steps: 1. Heat oil and saut√© onions. 2. Add spices and chicken. 3. Cook until chicken is done. 4. Garnish with cilantro. 5. Serve with rice.

title: Chocolate Brownies
preparation_steps: 1. Melt butter and chocolate. 2. Mix in sugar and eggs. 3. Add flour and mix well. 4. Bake in preheated oven. 5. Let cool and cut into squares.

title: Greek Salad
preparation_steps: 1. Chop tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions. 2. Add olives and feta cheese. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Toss and serve.

title: Beef Stir-Fry
preparation_steps: 1. Marinate beef in soy sauce and ginger. 2. Heat oil and stir-fry beef. 3. Add vegetables and cook until tender. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Serve with rice or noodles.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Spicy and creamy Indian chicken curry
preparation_steps: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices. 2. Grill or cook chicken until done. 3. Prepare the tomato-based sauce. 4. Add cooked chicken to the sauce. 5. Simmer for a few minutes. 6. Serve with rice or naan bread.
